Articles.Content: Hey all, I am going to attempt a mod making Satellite bases and Expermint mod, and I have done nothing to make parts yet, any ideas?

come up with a solid idea before announcing the mod? having some content to show off? i that when you decide to start doing this seriously (after you have at least a half solid idea) that you might want to ask those questions in the add-on help forums rather than here.

i am sorry if this have offended you. my point being is that you should have a thought out idea-even a preliminary one to try and implement

Edited September 9, 2015 by EladDv
Oh, sorry, how do I delete a thread?
